website_summaries.verdict: This classic push toy rewards babies with colorful balls and popping sounds as they toddle around the house.
pros: Your baby pushes the corn popper as he walks, causing plastic balls to pop around inside the toy
Helps build gross motor skills, sensory skills and cause-and-effect lessons
Intended for children ages 12 to 36 months
cons: It is loud, and there's no way to turn off the sound
The wheels may not turn freely, so the balls won't "pop"

customer_reviews.title: This is the defective version, DO NOT GET
customer_reviews.text: The description neglects to mention that this is the defective model that only pops when you pull it backwards but not forwards. Spend about $5 more and get the non-defective version of this product the 'Fisher-Price Brilliant Basics Corn Popper'.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Toy doesn't pop!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed, bought this corn popper for my little grandson because I remember my kids having so much fun with it - it doesn't work! The wheels don't roll unless you press down hard on the handle, I tried it on both a hard floor and carpet, it just drags along. I'll be returning this one and will look at the cheapie version in Walmart. What a pain!
customer_reviews.author: C. Eagleson

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. You have to apply downward pressure to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. You have to apply downward pressure to get it to pop. The design of the "wheels" is horrible. Thanks for making my daughter ultra frustrated. How this got past quality control at Fischer Price is beyond me. I put in for a refund from amazon and they sent a note back saying that there is no need to return it. Even amazon doesn't want this piece of garbage back.
customer_reviews.author: P3N15

customer_reviews.title: Yep- pretty lame. It's currently collecting dust in the corner
customer_reviews.text: It's such a bummer when you want to introduce something joyful to your child, and instead it's a total dud. The wheels on this don't turn. If I push it across the carpet and put all my weight into it, then maybe it'll give one or two half-hearted pops. Otherwise, forget about it. For a brief time my toddler would bring it to me and have me chase her with it, and I would just manually shake it so it would make noise. Yep- pretty lame. It's currently collecting dust in the corner, along with a bottle of "bubbles" that I suspect is just plain water.
customer_reviews.author: the long view

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: As soon as my son figured out how to use this toy, it broke. Now it only makes the popping sound when you pull it backwards. This is very frustrating for my son, who is too young to walk backwards very well, and who has seen me and his dad demonstrate it enough to know how it's supposed to work. I'd like to replace it but I already feel like the first one was a rip-off.
customer_reviews.author: Janna

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t pop! Do not buy. Dud.
customer_reviews.text: So disappointing. We purchased this classic “popper” for our 18 month old grandson. I should have heeded the reviews which stated that the toy doesn’t pop! It is visually appealing with the blue handle and other pretty colors, but the popper only pops when pulling BACKWARD. We tried the suggestion of putting rubber bands on the wheels to create friction to no avail. This is a defective toy, no doubt about it. Not worth returning for the 7.99 price tag. I would not recommend this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Laura J. Mcinteer

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Product looks good other than it was put into a box that it did not fit into well without any bubble wrap or packing peanuts and due to that the toy showed up fairly scratched up from shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth m

customer_reviews.title: defective item
customer_reviews.text: I think this popper would be fine except the item we received was defective - it doesn't pop when you push it, although it does when you pull it. The popper gizmo is either installed backwards or is broken in the forward direction. I may get another but from a store where I can check that it works first.
customer_reviews.author: book lover

customer_reviews.title: Now she is 18 months and walks around her house all day "vacuuming" like her momma
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to our grandchild on her first birthday and it was too mature for her. Now she is 18 months and walks around her house all day "vacuuming" like her momma! So - keep that in mind, wait till around a year and a half and you will make a very happy little boy or girl with this classic "blast from the past!" Wish it was wooden, though, like my children had. Oh well. Plastics are taking over the world. :-(
customer_reviews.author: MSM

customer_reviews.title: Works ok, needs more balls, and price has double in a month!
customer_reviews.text: My 1 1/2 yo Grandson liked this for a short time. About 5 mins.. I notice this Pop Corn toy does not always Pop, cause there should be more balls it. If there was more balls, the balls would be able to go into the little hole that moves up, and makes the balls Pop. I bought this in March-2016 for $8.47, and now in April less then a month I have had this, its $15.70.. It more then doubled in price. Do I think its worth the price double, No!
customer_reviews.author: Great Cook, Great Cook

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves this toy. It does make a loud pop-pop noise, but it's more bearable than some of those toys with never ending music. It works well indoors and outdoors. I wouldn't say that it will keep your kid occupied for a long time, but it's different from the rest of toys my son has and that's probably why he likes it so much. Most of our toys are sound free and focused on development rather than instant gratification, so a loud pop-pop is OK from time to time :).
customer_reviews.author: Ad Valorem

customer_reviews.title: I have noticed that fisher price's toys for tots have gotten super cheap over the years and am getting seriously disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The wheels will not roll forward on a flat surface, tile or carpet. Thus not popping. I have noticed that fisher price's toys for tots have gotten super cheap over the years and am getting seriously disappointed. We ordered quite a few things this Christmas as gifts and each one was cheaply made and disappointing. We've had better luck with V tech and leapfrog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your little one will LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Moms.... this product will annoy you BUT this is one of the BEST toys I have for my little one!!! LOVES IT! I find myself sometimes playing with it! My little one will pretend to vacuum, while I am vacuum with it. Brings it all around the house. It is a classic toy and honestly, so happy I purchased it! My little one is so happy too!
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Needs more traction or less tension
customer_reviews.text: This toy works a lot like the old school equivalent, but it's main spring is much too tight initially. For the toy to articulate the popper mechanim you need to put rubber bands on the wheels for traction. This gets better after a break-in period though.
customer_reviews.author: ScienceG

customer_reviews.title: Joyful noise maker motivated our struggling walker
customer_reviews.text: So motivating for our toddler who has a gross motor delay of about 6 months (as in toddler is 6 months behind the average toddler). I didn't really think this toy would be so motivating, but I knew for certain it would make our toddler use the muscles and practice the mechanisms that encourage walking. It's loud, but what a joyful noise!
customer_reviews.author: JMo

customer_reviews.title: A Toy All Children Should Have.
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as a gift and sent from Amazon. It wasn't easy to gift wrap, but I could have had it gift wrapped from Amazon. My two granchildren loved it. They also argued over who it belonged to for the gift. All little children should have one of these toys.
customer_reviews.author: D G

customer_reviews.title: I had one of these as a kid.
customer_reviews.text: This toy came fast and the packaging was very good. My 16month old really likes this toy. It's noisy but fun, it runs across carpet and also our tiled floors. It rolls better over the carpet though. My little cracks up at the popping sound that it makes, the faster you roll the more noise it makes.
customer_reviews.author: isiskia

customer_reviews.title: I wiped the clear plastic and it looked a little better. I am not sure if this was a ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not look shiny/new when I took it out of the box. I wondered if it had been handled too much. I wiped the clear plastic and it looked a little better. I am not sure if this was a manufacturing issue or just a lack of care for this item. I am going to try and work with this as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: H S

customer_reviews.title: 14 month old loves his popper
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves this thing. I have a very active 14 month old who has been slamming this thing around daily for a couple months and it is good as the day we got it. Great price and value. Seems well made. Noisy which my boy loves.
customer_reviews.author: PeeKay

customer_reviews.title: Timeless and Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My little guy got this for his 1st birthday and he loves it. He's so fascinated with trying to figure out how the balls pop so watching him play with it is entertaining for the adults as well. Shipping was right on time and the package came in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: cloudberryprincess

customer_reviews.title: Corn popper just as described makes popping noise when the ...
customer_reviews.text: Corn popper just as described makes popping noise when the wheels move, bought it for my daughter because it was a cheap toy to motivate her to try to stand up by herself with no other support and move around the house. However, she only started moving it correctly around the house once she was walking normally.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A.

customer_reviews.title: If it looks too good to be true, it probably is.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this toy because it looked used. It arrived dirty, including dirt inside the toy. It was listed at a bargain price. I knew why, as soon as I opened the box.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy C

customer_reviews.title: My grandson just turned one so is not walking around ...
customer_reviews.text: My grandson just turned one so is not walking around and pushing this yet but HE HAS A PLAN. He has analyzed how to hold it to make it pop. He holds the popper and points to me to request me to make noise.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie A. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them...
customer_reviews.text: It only pops when pulled backwards.... I know it's defective but I'd rather it only pops when she pulls it backwards while "vacuuming".... the other one i bought at Wal-Mart pops both ways..
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toy for beginner walkers and toddlers
customer_reviews.text: We bought this when our baby started walking. He immediately loved it and a few months down the road I can say he still lives this toy. He’s banged this thing around and it hasn’t been damaged. It’s great quality and you can’t beat the price. We waited a while for this product but it’s worth the wait. Buy it! Your baby will love this!
customer_reviews.author: Tessie

customer_reviews.title: First birthday present became a disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my son's birthday. He had played with one before at his friend's house. And he absolutely loved it. But the Fisher-Price corn popper that came in was made differently so it would not spin on our tile or laminate floors. Poor baby coun't Understand why it wasn't working so he ended updragging it around and it turning into a really big Rattler it was a huge disappointment. Dont get me wrong Most kids would have fun with paper in a box, but this broken toy got his attention for a full 15 seconds. Thanks Fisher Price for disappointing his first birthday. This is a classic example of poor design and cheap materials to make bigger profit.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Girodet

customer_reviews.title: Bring back the BLAST from the PAST !!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm kinda disappointed BC it doesn't POP as often or as LOUD as the "old school" one that drove adults crazy but EVERY kid absolutely had a BLAST playing with it !!! ( maybe it was the shag carpeting that caused the crazy popping !!! Hard wood floors, eh, not so much !) LOL ; )
customer_reviews.author: APQ

customer_reviews.title: A classic
customer_reviews.text: This popper is a classic. My wife and I both have great childhood memories of playing with this toy, so we were so excited when we purchased it for our son. Guess what, he absolutely loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great buy though
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this toy. He thinks he is cleaning when he uses it. It doesn't pop the way it should though. We bought his here because target wanted too much for theirs. We didn't return it because we simply could not get him to part with it. A great buy though.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Our daughter loves this
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves this. She just laughs and laughs if we chase her with it. She loves pushing it all over the house. We hide it behind the couch until we want her to play with it because it is a little noisy!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hahn

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Given to my 18 mo old grandson. He loved it..just like his mother did 30 yrs ago. A timeless toy
customer_reviews.author: melanie

customer_reviews.title: This looks USED
customer_reviews.text: I expected a NEW toy for my grandson and this had clearly been used. Don't purchase from this seller. They are passing off used toys as new ones. Very disappointing. It looks like it should have been at the Goodwill.
customer_reviews.author: Adele Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler toy
customer_reviews.text: I love this little popper. My nephew thinks it’s a vacuum and follows his mom around the house. Very amusing for me and him.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Logan

customer_reviews.title: just be aware that you are going to incur charges for the useless box.
customer_reviews.text: The toy is ok. My 20 month old son likes it. But it came in a HUGE box, twice the required size, so if you are shipping outside of the US, just be aware that you are going to incur charges for the useless box.
customer_reviews.author: jigeo

customer_reviews.title: Just like the one you had as a kid
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our grandson because we still remembered playing with this toy as kids. He's only one, so he drags it around behind him half the time, but he loves playing with it. It's his go-to toy when he comes over.
customer_reviews.author: john mccurrach

customer_reviews.title: Bright colors, makes noises, and moves around, one of the best toys made.
customer_reviews.text: My wife wasn't sure my 1.5year old would play with this, but the second she saw it, she played with it for about an hour straight and even now a few months down the road, she still plays with it all the time. This is a great, and rather cheap, toy for a kid and encourages them to walk.
customer_reviews.author: R.E.L.1203

customer_reviews.title: Love This 💖💖💖
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge hit with my 13 month old. He loves the colors and the popping sound is not too loud. Beware: smiles and giggles will occur 💖💖💖
customer_reviews.author: M. Fritz

customer_reviews.title: My toddler likes to playfully chase us around the house ...
customer_reviews.text: My toddler likes to playfully chase us around the house with this toy! I had purchased a similar one for my oldest child several years ago, and that one had thin strips of rubber that helped grip the floor, making it easier to pop the balls. No grips on the wheels of this one. Kiddo needs to push harder on the handle to make it pop.
customer_reviews.author: PghGranola

customer_reviews.title: It was the best gift of the party
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for 1 year old. No lie, he plushed it around the house for close to an hour. It was the best gift of the party!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item for my toddler (2 years old) as she really likes pushing/pulling things around the house. The "popper" part of the toy doesn't work like it's supposed to as it doesn't pop but every so often.
customer_reviews.author: Dan S.

customer_reviews.title: Traditional toys are best
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my grandson and he loves it, not so sure if this parents were too thrilled. Different design from what my kids had, but it still works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Landes

customer_reviews.title: More or less just like the one from the 60's
customer_reviews.text: More or less just like the one from the 60's. Slightly updated style, doesn't pop as frequently when rolled as the classic 60's version. Depending on your point of view this might be a bug or it might be a feature.
customer_reviews.author: Woundrn

customer_reviews.title: exactly as described :~)
customer_reviews.text: I had one when I was little and now my son has one and loves it :~) sturdy, well-made, and exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgett M. Blose

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: I think the baby in this picture is not smiling; instead he's showing a look of frustration because this popper is terrible. I had one for my kids in the 70s that did what it's supposed to do. This one doesn't work either on hard wood or carpet. The wheels are poorly designed. I wish I had read the reviews before purchasing. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: It takes a lot of downward force to make it pop. My 14 month old can push it, but he doesn't get the popping. Even I have a hard time getting it to pop if not on carpet. Just ordered a vintage one on eBay. These new ones are garbage.
customer_reviews.author: OpheliaFoote

customer_reviews.title: Boys love things that make big noises!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this push popcorn popper for our grandson. He loved it. My daughter sent a video of him pushing it around and making big pop pop noises which he loved!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Parker

customer_reviews.title: Very nice little toy
customer_reviews.text: It was a hit for my 16 month old he loves this popper toy. Pushes arround my house and this toy and tally pops on hard wood floors his elephant one didn't at all I am not to fond of the popping noise but hey thier only kids once
customer_reviews.author: alisha

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work going forward...only backward....way overpriced.  Go to Target!
customer_reviews.text: Great product by fisher price but this one does not work going forward which I didn't realize right away since my grandson only started playing with it recently. Saw it elsewhere....7.99!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Classic Toy
customer_reviews.text: It works as expected. It pops going forward and in reverse. Very cute, simple toy! My 22 month old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: AvidReader

customer_reviews.title: Fisher-Price Corn popper great product
customer_reviews.text: Fisher-Price Corn Popper was purchased for 13 month old nephew just beginning to walk. Great product and great price. Very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Christy

customer_reviews.title: Parents nightmare but kids love it
customer_reviews.text: So torn writing this because as a parent I hate this toy. I have yet to meet a child that doesn’t absolutely adore it though.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: A classic. And it was especially gratifying as payback ...
customer_reviews.text: A classic. And it was especially gratifying as payback to my brother, who bought all his neices and nephews obnoxious loud toys they used incessantly!
customer_reviews.author: TKOESQ

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: I got two for Christmas. One was a gift and the other I had bought. Now my twins run around popping these off together giggling. They don't go a day without it. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Missy K.

customer_reviews.title: Used toy?
customer_reviews.text: Item looks used. Dome is scratched and dirty. White area at bottom is dirty and dented. If I would have bought this at a garage sale for $2 I would expect this but not when buying a new product. Item was a gift so I didn't not have time to return it plus I know he will run it into stuff and it will get scratched and dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Tehra Weddle

customer_reviews.title: Be careful!
customer_reviews.text: Its fine for the kids, but my husband and I have tripped over this thing multiple times each.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: ... all I need to know that it is a good
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter's smile is all I need to know that it is a good product
customer_reviews.author: Renee M.

customer_reviews.title: Never gets old
customer_reviews.text: Great fun for my 13 month old!! One of his favorites. He will "vacuum" alongside of me when I'm cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Busybee11

customer_reviews.title: Good toy, but does not pop as much as ...
customer_reviews.text: Good toy, but does not pop as much as the older make used to. The only problem is that you must teach the child to keep the wheels firmly against the floor to make it pop, where with the older ones you did not ha e to press down like that. They popped faster, too.
customer_reviews.author: Jolo60

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this toy. I love that the old retro toys are still popular.
customer_reviews.author: bwells

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her popper and runs around the house with it. It is exactly what I expected when I ordered it. A classic corn popper toy.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Fisher Price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter enjoys this. Found one for $5 cheaper at the store afterwards. But I guess it was worth having it delivered to my doorstep.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Rains

customer_reviews.title: Not What I expected
customer_reviews.text: The balls does not pop when pushed forward :( Only when you are pulling it
customer_reviews.author: Aish

customer_reviews.title: We Love This Old Fashioned Toy
customer_reviews.text: My 11 month Granddaughter loves this. She never gets tired of it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan T. Mahan

customer_reviews.title: Classic Baby Toy
customer_reviews.text: Great price for baby toy staple! Keeps my 18 month old very busy and she keeps coming back for more day after day for almost a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I thought it worked just fine. My granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Tulbert

customer_reviews.title: Corn Popper is very funny.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, I love Fisher-Price. The Corn Popper is very funny, its sound is funny. The shipping was fast and I liked that.
customer_reviews.author: Cathe

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed that this wasn't boxed by the manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed that this wasn't boxed by the manufacturer. It just came in a large amazing box. When you are buying items new with the intent to gift them- you expect some packaging.
customer_reviews.author: JPRDNNS

customer_reviews.title: Annoying for parents cause of the noise but they love
customer_reviews.text: My son is 2 and still loves to play with this! Annoying for parents cause of the noise but they love it
customer_reviews.author: Tina Morreale

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Fun toy.
customer_reviews.text: Probably every kid had one of this. The corn popper is built well and works great. It offers an amazing value and lots of fun for my kid.
customer_reviews.author: HappyM

customer_reviews.title: Classic toy
customer_reviews.text: A must for every child. Another classic toy that lasts.
customer_reviews.author: fwilson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect toy for a one year old. Ageless, tried and true.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to push and make the sound for an adult...impossible for a child
customer_reviews.author: Reliable Utilities Services

customer_reviews.title: Requires a great deal of pressure for the wheels to spin caustng ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunatley not made as well as they use to be. Requires a great deal of pressure for the wheels to spin caustng balls to pop. DISAPPOINTED1
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L.

customer_reviews.title: Twins love it
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old twins love this so much! I ended up buying a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: This item is really weird. It was only 12.99. So i guess you get what you pay for. It is cheap and the balls don't pop like they should. I would not recommend this item to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. The popper does not work unless you push ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. The popper does not work unless you push down hard. My granddaughter cannot make it work on her own. What happened to the original poppers that any child could have fun with!!
customer_reviews.author: D Web

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good "classic" toy. Just what I was looking for and cheaper than local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie

customer_reviews.title: Mske sure items for toddlers are clean, please
customer_reviews.text: Very dirty took several cleans with bleach and pine sol before I could give it to my grandbaby
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All little ones need this
customer_reviews.text: Every household needs this experience. This model is just the right size, noise level and price!
customer_reviews.author: Rural Margie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is still the same as when I had one as a kid. My granddaughter calls it her pop pop.
customer_reviews.author: Ranae

customer_reviews.title: Popcorn popper does not pop
customer_reviews.text: Fisher Price must be supplying Amazon with their returns or less. The last three items I bought did not work,neither did the replacements. I won't be purchasing FP from amazon anymore
customer_reviews.author: R. Moore

customer_reviews.title: poor design
customer_reviews.text: the button does not work and does not pop the little balls. The wheels do not spin, so the whole thing has to be dragged on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor toy and perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great outdoor toy and perfect for the price. Got one for each of my twins. They are 22 months and still love to push their popper outside!
customer_reviews.author: JaimeBZ

customer_reviews.title: Was a hit for my kids as well as my grand daughter!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product!! Our kids had one 30 years ago so we bought it for our grand daughter! She absolutely loves this!
customer_reviews.author: RONALD L RIBBENS

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my grandbaby. I had one, my ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my grandbaby. I had one, my kids had one and every kid should have at least one noisy toy to drive the parents or grandparents nuts!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great classic toy
customer_reviews.text: What is there to say? It's a classic. Kids love it. Shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine O'brien

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The wheels don't move easily for a toddler to push around. You have to push down hard on the toy to get the balls to pop up. Disappointed. Not toddler friendly.
customer_reviews.author: shop'n wife

customer_reviews.title: but it showed up like 25 kids already played with it
customer_reviews.text: Yes it's a kid toy,but it showed up like 25 kids already played with it. IT HAD SCRATCHS on the clear plastic and some black markings on it too.
customer_reviews.author: Gir

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It came in so fast and my Grand daughter loves it
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Ernst

customer_reviews.title: No like the ones from years ago.
customer_reviews.text: you really have to work at it to get it to pop. not like the one from years ago. Didn't send back, but disappointed in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality production
customer_reviews.text: This popper doesn't work. When my son walks with it it doesn't pop and he gets frustrated. It only pops when I walk with him and I haveto push down the toy hard in order for it to work. Very poor quality production
customer_reviews.author: Guess who

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old daughter loves it! She loves to 'vacuum' the house all the time to help me.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this, but it's hard for her ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this, but it's hard for her to get it to pop on the hardwood floor. It's easier on carpet. She's 12 months.
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: too light... wont pop unless you push ...
customer_reviews.text: too light ... wont pop unless you push down hard...kids can't
customer_reviews.author: Adams Family

customer_reviews.title: Fisher-Price Corn Popper an enjoyable toy!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson, fifteen months, loves his blue Fisher-Price Corn Popper.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter plays with it every time she is over ...
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter plays with it every time she is over and I can't say that about all of her toys! well made and she loves making it pop. she also learned what it meant to use both of her hands!
customer_reviews.author: marylynn

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to get it popping because of the wheels. I put some strips of duct tape on the wheels and that seems to help. Other than that my 10 month old (then) grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Debra A Provencher

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Just got this for my little ones Christmas gift. It doesnt pop :/ I was so excited about seeing him push this around and it doesn't work
customer_reviews.author: K Wil

customer_reviews.title: Traction needed
customer_reviews.text: Put some traction on the wheels. Rubber bands won't stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Danny K

customer_reviews.title: Classic toy.
customer_reviews.text: Classic toy. It's encouraging my nephew to want to walk and not crawl.
customer_reviews.author: MandM

product_meta.title: Fisher-Price Corn Popper, Blue
product_meta.description: The classic Fisher-Price Corn Popper push toy now sports a sleek new design. But it’s as much fun for baby as ever! The brightly colored balls excitedly pop around inside the clear dome as baby pushes the Corn Popper toy along. And the faster baby goes, the faster the poppity-pop action! Baby’s encouraged to keep moving for all the exciting ball-poppin’ sounds and action – a fun way to give baby’s gross motor skills a push in the right direction.
feature_bullets: A new look for this classic, baby-favorite push toy!
Walking & pushing the Corn Popper along help strengthen gross motor skills
Baby’s actions make things happen – a great introduction to cause & effect!
Bright colors & popping sounds help stimulate baby’s senses and are a delightful reward for baby
